channel.title: Wont read the damn txt
channel.description: I made a textfield. made the printwriter everything works fine EXCEPT when i put +TXT FIELD NAME+ it wont do it. i tried TX FIELD.getText()); but it wont work.. here is the whole writer [code] PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(new File("Command.txt")))); //write the file out.write("if (command.startsWith(+name1+) && playerRights >= +rights+"); out.close(); [/code]

well at the beginning i found one… then people recommend others. then i get confused.

item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I made a textfield. made the printwriter everything works fine EXCEPT when i put +TXT FIELD NAME+ it wont do it. i tried TX FIELD.getText()); but it wont work… here is the whole writer

PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(new File("Command.txt")))); //write the file out.write("if (command.startsWith(+name1+) && playerRights >= +rights+"); out.close();
